TopicTitle: Has anyone here played SCP Containment Breach?

Articles.Content:
Has anyone here played the horror game SCP Containment Breach? What do you think about it? (I personally think it should be released on steam early access so it gets a lot more coverage)

http://www.scpcbgame.com/

http://www.scpcbgame.com/info.html

Has anyone here played the horror game SCP Containment Breach? What do you think about it? (I personally think it should be released on steam early access so it gets a lot more coverage)

http://www.scpcbgame.com/

http://www.scpcbgame.com/info.html

I guess this game isn't as well known as I thought it was... heres a video for you *obviously as its a lets play, it contains some SPOILERS*... (the game is now in version 0.9.3, this lets play starts when the game is in version 0.3)

Edited April 12, 2014 by kerbonaut101
Ah, its been a little while since I've last played it. /sarcasm Fun times, fun times. /sarcasm
I love it, in the "I don't want to stop otherwise 610 will get the world at night" way.

I've got a book on it ATM. I just posted it and then find this so just look for my book, it's on this section so read it if SCP is that interesting to you.
